sentences.sContent: Objective To prove the clinical effect of portable auto-haemostat machine on body's limbs.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective To prove the clinical effect of portable auto-haemostat machine on body's limbs.
sentences.sCn: 目的：验证便携式肢体自动止血器的人体临床效用。

sentences.sContent: Conclusion The portable high-frequency argon-beam coagulatory haemostat is excellent and reliable.
sentences.sContent_eng: Conclusion The portable high-frequency argon-beam coagulatory haemostat is excellent and reliable.
sentences.sCn: 结论：便携式高频氩束凝固止血器具有良好可靠的止血效果。

trans.tranOther: a surgical instrument that stops bleeding by compression of a blood vessel
